title: Ripple Design System
description: Ripple is the design system for Victorian government digital products

primaryCTA.title: For Designers
primaryCTA.description: Information for designers using Ripple to create brand Victoria compliant digital experiences.

secondaryCTA.title: For Developers
secondaryCTA.description: How to get started implementing Ripple UI components in digital products.

modulesCTA.title: Modules
modulesCTA.description: Paragraph Default. Cards contain actionable content about a single topic. These are usually grouped as similar style sets.

quickLink1.title: About Ripple
quickLink1.description: Ripple is a system of reusable styles, components, patterns and tools for creating Victorian government digital experiences.

quickLink2.title: Who should use it
quickLink2.description: Ripple is built by government for government to deliver services Victorians trust and rely on.

quickLink3.title: Design principles
quickLink3.description: The guiding principles that are the foundation of the Ripple Design System.

framework.title: Ripple framework
framework.description: Ripple framework contains the tools for building SDP sites using Ripple design system components.
